thread.title: Danger! These 7 chemicals are hiding in your everyday products
thread.title_full: Danger! These 7 chemicals are hiding in your everyday products

title: Danger! These 7 chemicals are hiding in your everyday products
text: Danger! These 7 chemicals are hiding in your everyday products TNN | January 31, 2017 1 /8 7 dangerous chemicals that surround you every day It goes without saying that harsh and toxic chemicals should be avoided at all costs. But sometimes these dangerous chemicals escape our radar and co-exist in the same space as ours. Here we list seven such things you think as safe allies but they may be backstabbing you to an unhealthy state. (Image Courtesy: Shutterstock)   /8 Detergents - Sodium lauryl sulfate, NPE, Phosphates (among others) The detergents that we use mindlessly when washing our clothes contain a whole range of cancer causing chemicals, some of them being Sodium lauryl sulfate, NPE (nonylphenol ethoxylate), Phosphates and 1,4 dioxane. These are known to cause skin irritation, organ toxicity, affect reproductive health and can cause possible mutations and even cancer. Not just these, when you contaminate water with these, it adversely impacts the environment and the waterways. Healthy alternative: Natural or home made detergents (Image Courtesy: Getty)
